5 amazing facts about cats:
 1) Cats can jump up to 6 times their height.
 2) They have a total of 18 toes.
 3) There are over 500 million pet cats!
 4) Cats sleep for around 13 to 16 hours a day (70% of their life).
 5) 1 year of a cats life equals to 15 years of a humans live.

5 amazing facts about dogs:
 1) Their sense of smell is at least 40x better than ours.
 2) Some have such good noses they can sniff out medical problems.
 3) Dogs can sniff at the same time as breathing.
 4) Some dogs are incredible swimmers.
 5) Some are fast and could even beat a cheetah!

5 amazing facts about rabbits:
 1) A baby rabbit is called a kit, a female is called a doe and a male is called a buck.
 2) Rabbits are very social creatures that live in groups. They live in warrens — a series of tunnels and rooms that they dig underground.
 3) Rabbits breed for their whole life.
 4) A rabbit’s teeth never stop growing! Instead, they’re gradually worn down as the rabbit chews on grasses, wildflowers and vegetables — meaning they never get too long.
 5) Rabbits often eat their poop.
